description:
In the private confines of the darkroom, Yamada sheds her top and makes a move on Kosuda! Later, she enters a school beauty contest to show the boy exactly what he’s missing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anshitsu de Kyuusekkin! Chotto Kiken na Bukatsu!? / Moeru Bunkasai! Gakuen no Joou wa Kono Watashi!!
Approccio Improvviso nella Camera Oscura! Un`Attività del Club Leggermente Pericolosa?! - Un Eccitante Festival Scolasticol! Io, Yamada, sono la Regina della Scuola!!
Suddenly So Close in the Darkroom! Kinda Dangerous Club Activities?! - Passionate School Festival! I, Yamada, Will Be the School`s Queen!
暗室で急接近! ちょっとキケンな部活動!? / 燃える文化祭! 学園の女王はこの山田(わたし)!!
